short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shortcuts for launching various Salesforce Lightning setup pages

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of waiting for the Lightning UI to load before you can navigate to setup/deployments/debug logs etc.?

Install this Chrome extension and you can do that all without being blocked.

Blog post about it here: https://rohitmacherla.com/posts/chrome-extension-for-navigating-lightning-ui

Wanna contribute? Code is open source here: https://github.com/markgarg/sfdc-lightning-shortcuts-chrome-extn

v1.1: 
 - Introduces support for Custom Settings
 - Automatically switches focus to new tabs that were opened
